description:
Good news for fans of "House of Lies" and "Shameless," as Showtime says they will be back in 2015 for their fourth and fifth seasons, respectively. Both shows have been given 12 episodes each, joining the already renewed "Episodes."《无耻之徒》和《谎言堂》粉丝们，好消息来了，Showtime电视台宣布他们将会续订2015年的《谎言堂》第四季和《无耻之徒》第五季。两部剧的新季都续订了12集，恭喜这两部剧加入还有《Episodes》在内的被续订大军。

Showtime has built itself a solid two-hour programming block with the three shows, keeping viewers tuning in. "Shameless" is averaging 5.5 million weekly viewers (across all platforms), up eight percent over last season. Meanwhile, "House of Lies" is on par with its second season, pulling in an average of 3 million viewers.Showtime电视台已经只做了一档2小时的3剧联合预告。《无耻之徒》平均收视人数在550万左右，比上一季增长了8%。同时《谎言堂》和该剧第二季收视水平相当，平均收视人数在300万左右。

"Shameless" airs Sundays at 9 p.m. ET, followed by "House of Lies" at 10.《无耻之徒》在每周日晚9点播出，而《谎言堂》则是周日晚的10点开播。

title: 《无耻之徒》第五季获得续订
